DescriptionText.Text: Three weeks away from the rat race. No email, no cell phones, not a worry in the world. This is the life. - %1$s
Trying to keep Ed out of trouble. Mostly failing.
Always good for a laugh and a misadventure.
Three weeks away from the rat race. No email, no cell phones, not a worry in the world. This is the life. - %1$s
Trying to keep Ed out of trouble. Mostly failing.
Always good for a laugh and a misadventure.
Fishing before dawn is awesome, except when you were up till three the night before. Where the hell does Ed put all that whiskey? - %1$s
Best thing about this trip? No cell reception. No e-mail alerts from work, no "the Meyers account needs to be audited by Monday morning" texts, no RSS feeds. Just peace, quiet, and fresh fish. - %1$s
Ed's hitting on the girl at the bait shop. Again. God help us all. - %1$s
Lots of weird noises last night. Sounded like people setting off fireworks or something. Ed says it's Spencer's Mill's 75th Annual Bored Teenager Days. - %1$s
This vacation was not even close to long enough. Ah well. Time to start packing up. Back to reality. I'm not looking forward to seeing what my work inbox looks like. - %1$s

Console_Command.Command: LOG: Initializing Stockpiles for Spencer's Mill community.

Eventually, you'll find fatigue building up. A snack will give you a temporary energy boost, but to really fight fatigue you should think about stepping away and resting for a day. You can also radio home and talk to Pastor Will. He has a way of inspiring people to keep going. - %1$s

SummaryText.Text: Talk to the Pastor for help.

TutorialText.Text: Crises cannot be ignored.

DescriptionText.Text: While I was away, Ed succumbed to his injuries. As promised, Alan immediately put a bullet in his brain, so there was no risk of him turning. - %1$s
Wasn't treated in time.
Did what was necessary.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: Unlocking Side Arcs as a Failsafe

DescriptionText.Text: Jacob was MIA for a while, but he has returned. - %1$s
Back in business.
Jacob has healed up from his wounds. - %1$s
Back in business.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: Unlocking Side Arcs as a Failsafe
LOG: Unlocking Side Arcs as a Failsafe

DescriptionText.Text: Alan was MIA for a while, but he has returned. - %1$s
Back in business.
Alan has healed up from his wounds. - %1$s
Back in business.
The town of Spencer's Mill is almost completely overrun with the walking dead. Pastor Will has welcomed a group of survivors into the church, where they are doing what they can to survive. - %1$s
The voice on the radio.
This is his church.
Seems like an asshole.
Haven't seen much of her yet.

DescriptionText.Text: Word's getting around about us. I've heard from another group of survivors who'd like to join us. - %1$s

DescriptionText.Text: Thought you were hot shit kicking me out, right? Well, it turns out I don't need you assholes. - %1$s
Has a new home.
